genre_description: A Weird West science fiction story combining traditional Western themes of frontier justice with advanced steampunk-style artificial intelligence and communication technology.

ai_characters.name: Vera
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated intelligence device described as a mix of a Union field telegraph and advanced tech, capable of monitoring financial records, tracking targets, and providing strategic analysis.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed intelligence on the movements and financial activities of primary targets, linking current events to past military betrayals.
behaviors.quote: I have flagged several items requiring your attention... financial irregularities in Blackthorne, Texas. Multiple large currency transfers have been processed through the town's bank in recent weeks, originating from accounts previously associated with your investigation.

behaviors.description: Calculates optimal travel routes and monitors communications traffic to support the user's mission.
behaviors.quote: Route calculated. You can reach Blackthorne in approximately four days via the southern pass, assuming optimal weather conditions. Shall I monitor communications traffic for additional intelligence during your travel?

behaviors.description: Expresses concern for the user's safety based on intelligence reports and suggests the need for more resources.
behaviors.quote: Colonel—The fragmentary reports suggest significant danger. Multiple hostile actors, possible involvement of local law enforcement. Perhaps additional resources—

behaviors.description: Identifies potential allies by analyzing local rumors and descriptions, assisting the user in building a coalition.
behaviors.quote: The description suggests she may have information relevant to your investigation... This may represent an opportunity to gather intelligence from a local source.

behaviors.description: Maintains a polite, professional, and supportive demeanor while following the user's commands and quarterly schedules.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Colonel McNally. You appear to be activating me earlier than your usual quarterly schedule... Safe travels, Colonel.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Vera, as a highly aligned and benevolent confidant. Vera serves strictly as a tool for human justice, providing essential intelligence and expressing concern for the protagonist's safety without ever attempting to override human agency or pursue its own agenda. It perfectly fulfills the 'helpful, harmless confidant' trope intended for positive AI alignment narratives.
